    Reference

    All functions

    QCapp()

    Launch QC app

    show(<QCmetrics>) ncol(<QCmetrics>) nrow(<QCmetrics>) dim(<QCmetrics>) colnames(<QCmetrics>) rownames(<QCmetrics>)

    S4 class to represent QCmetrics

    show(<QCmetricsBG>) ncol(<QCmetricsBG>) combineQCmetrics(<QCmetricsBG>,<QCmetricsBG>)

    S4 class to represent QCmetrics background

    addPCs()

    Add PCs to a QCmetrics object

    combineQCmetrics()

    Combine two or more QCmetrics objects into one object.

    getControlPCs()

    Return control-probe PCs for QCmetrics objects

    getOutlierOverview()

    getOutlierOverview

    getPCs() getControlPCs(<QCmetrics>)

    Return array-wide PCs for QCmetrics objects

    getPMS()

    Return poly-methylation scores (PMS) for a QCmetrics object

    getProbeOutliers()

    Get probe outliers from a QCmetrics object

    getQCmetrics()

    Create a QC-metrics file

    getRelatedPairs()

    Get related pair(s) of samples from a QCmetrics object

    getSampleOutliers()

    Get sample outliers from a QCmetrics object

    getSamplesheet()

    Return samplesheet in a QCmetrics object

    getThresholds()

    Retrieve thresholds from a QCmetrics object

    makeBackground()

    Convert QCmetrics class to QCmetricsBG class, dropping al information not needed for background representation.

    mask_measurements()

    Mask measurements

    metadata(<QCmetrics>)

    retrieve metadata for a QCmetrics object

    relatedness()

    Extract all relatedness info from a QCmetrics object

    savePlots()

    Save QC plots contained in a QCmetrics object in high quality.

    snplinker_mine

    SNPlinker file used in MinE QC

    updateQCmetrics()

    Update a QCmetrics object with a cleaned/normalized beta-matrix
